thread.title_full: A Champagne Vending Machine Has Arrived In The US | Letty B | Y93

title: A Champagne Vending Machine Has Arrived In The US | Letty B | Y93
text:
A Champagne Vending Machine Has Arrived In The US posted by Letty B - share 
Source: Getty 
Last year London introduced a Champagne vending machine that we were seriously SO jealous of here in the US. But, it looks like we've gotten one of our own! 
The Mandarin Oriental Hotel in Las Vegas is home to the first Champagne vending machine in the US. You can find it inside the hotel on the 23rd floor at the "Sky Bar." It is fully stocked with mini bottles of Moet & Chandon and tiny flutes so you can keep it classy and not drink out of the bottle. 
To use the vending machine you must purchase a $20 coin from the front desk and also provide an ID to show you are legal drinking age. Simple enough! Then take the coin, drop it into the machine and then cheers - champagne time! A post shared by Moto Moto Travel (@motomototravel) on Feb 2, 2017 at 6:12pm PST A post shared by Erin Kowaluk (@blumeroo) on Feb 6, 2017 at 9:09am PST A post shared by Maja Ulakovic (@missmajaulakovic) on Feb 1, 2017 at 9:44am PST 
Source: Instagram
